Let's Play A Game

Let's Play A Game

You‚Äôre going to see images of some animals. You‚Äôll see two copies of the same animal. The images will be either the same, or a mirror image, as if the animal is looking in the mirror. Your goal is to decide whether the two pictures are the same or different.

Let's Play A Game

Hooray! You are correct!
Uh, oh! Actually, these are the same. Do you see how both crocodiles are looking in the same direction?

See those crocodiles? Are those the same, or different (mirror image)? Use the mouse to move and click on either SAME or MIRROR IMAGE.
